Zoe Lister-Jones on ‘The Craft’ and Women’s Power

multimedia.caption: Often films about teenagers with special powers focus on how overwhelmed they are, Lister-Jones said. “I don’t think that’s a message we need to be giving to young women anymore. I think the more power, the better.”

What’s more fundamental to scary movies than the bone-chilling shriek? But delivering a terrifying wail isn’t easy. It’s an entire art with a history and a world of its own.

des_facet: The Big Bad B-Movie Show (TV Program)
results.abstract: This Halloween, a new generation of hosts are keeping alive one of television’s oldest gimmicks: costumed goofballs presenting schlocky horror movies.

multimedia.caption: Zachariah Durr and Laura Wimbels are the horror hosts Leopold and Lenora on “The Big Bad B-Movie Show,” a new local series in Cleveland that evokes one of TV’s oldest traditions.

results.title: How New York’s Small Cinemas Are Hanging On
